roleset.name: change location
roleset.note: MOVE-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls slide-11.2, roll-51.3.1, calibratable_cos-45.6-1. (from move.01-v)
MOVE-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls slide-11.2, roll-51.3.1, calibratable_cos-45.6-1. (from move.01-n)
MOVING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, move-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls slide-11.2, roll-51.3.1, calibratable_cos-45.6-1. (from moving.01-n)
MOVEMENT-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls slide-11.2, roll-51.3.1, calibratable_cos-45.6-1. (from movement.01-n)

role.descr: aspect, domain in which arg1 moving

example.name: move-v: agentive
example.text: [The leadership]-1 hopes *trace*-1 to move the compromise measure promptly to the White House.

example.name: move-v: ergative
example.text: ...including about two million customers who *trace* have moved during that period.

example.name: move-v: with EXT
example.text: The Dow Jones Industrial Average moved 50 points.

example.name: move-v: all args
example.text: When I was a senior in high school, my parents moved house to the outskirts of Lexington, Massachusetts.
example.arg: When I was a senior in high school
to the outskirts of Lexington, Massachusetts

example.name: move-n: autogen1
example.text: his move to the chairmanship

example.name: move-n: autogen2
example.text: Digital 's move into mainframes

example.name: move-n: with EXT
example.text: the large - scale move by Taiwan companies to the PRC

example.name: move-n: With DIR
example.text: a downward move in dollar - mark trade

example.name: move-n
example.text: Cotto himself swore that he would never let Margarito earn another penny from his name , but another recent stoppage defeat to Manny Pacquiao and a move up in weight has left the Caguas resident with little routes left to big money purse fights .

example.name: moving-n: arg1, 2
example.text: The San Jose attorneys also assert that the grant of San Jose territorial rights to the Giants was "subject to their moving to Santa Clara County.

example.name: movement-n
example.text: the movement of young cattle onto feedlots in the month ofSeptember in seven big ranch states

example.name: movement-n
example.text: a series of sell lists hit the Street and capped upward pricemovement in the sector

example.name: movement-n
example.text: Israeli security restrictions on cross-border movement

roleset.name: take measures, put forth strategic effort toward a goal
roleset.note: MOVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'move' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus. (from move.02-v predicate notes)
MOVING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on move-v.02. No VNcls. (from moving.02-n)
MOVE-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Comparison to move.02 and move.04-v. No Vncls. FN class intentionally_act. Updated by Katie. (from move.02-n)

roles.note: This is the sense that should be used for games as well unless there is a specific mention of game piece movement (in which case, use move.01)The verb roles for move.02 and move.04 have been conflated here. This is because in noun senses it is impossible to tell the difference between the two roles. (from move.02-n)

example.name: move-v: measures as infinitive
example.text: Southeast Asian nations will move *trace* to accomodate Japanese business.

example.name: moving-n: both args
example.text: I had intended calling to the attention of the Convention the matter of his moving to strike out the present provision which allows the jury to judge of the law...
example.arg: to strike out the present provision which allows the jury to judge of the law

example.name: move-n: work towards a goal
example.text: Time magazine , in a move to reduce the costs of wooing new subscribers ...
example.arg: to reduce the costs of wooing new subscribers

example.name: move-n: make an effort
example.text: moves to ease credit

example.name: move-n: with arg0
example.text: the president 's most spectacular move would be to annoint a presidential successor

example.name: move-n: both args
example.text: President Hugo Chavez 's move to strengthen ties with the communist island
example.arg: to strengthen ties with the communist island

example.name: move-n: goal can include an anti-benefactive
example.text: aggressive moves against smuggling

example.name: move-n: or a benefactive/direction moved toward
example.text: a laudable move toward modernization

example.name: move-n: move on, attack sense
example.text: Gemany's move on Poland

example.name: move-n: you can still have a prp arg, and this may be common
example.text: Raja's move on USOF to benefit only one company

roleset.name: impelled action
roleset.note: MOVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'move' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus. (from move.03-v predicate notes)
MOVING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on move-v.03. (from moving.03-n)

example.name: move-v: typical
example.text: This somewhat-ambiguous assessment moves one Alliance portfolio manager to ask: ``So, what is this -- a Stealth recession?''
example.arg: to ask: ``So, what is this -- a Stealth recession?''

example.name: move-v: all args
example.text: Instead, the typical victim of cercion is moved to comply by a desire that he could easily resist if he so desired, but which he acts upon because he fully endorses both his possession of the desire and its moving him to act.

roleset.name: attack
roleset.note: MOVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'move' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus. (from move.04-v predicate notes)
MOVING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on move-v.04. (from moving.04-n)

example.name: move-v: charge!
example.text: The President of the United States urged [the Panamanian armed forces]-1 [*-1]to move against Mr. Noriega.

example.name: move-v: similar, different prep
example.text: At the same time, [abortion foes]-3 have developed a national legislative strategy, [*-3]-4 deciding [*-4] to move on what Jacki Ragan, the National Right to Life Committee's director of state organizational development, calls `` reasonable measures that an overwhelming mainstream majority of Americans support.''
example.arg: on what Jacki Ragan, the National Right to Life Committee's director of state organizational development, calls `` reasonable measures that an overwhelming mainstream majority of Americans support.''

example.name: moving-n: both args
example.text: Following is what is rumored to have been discussed: Imminent collapse of the U.S. economy by September 2008; imminent collapse of the U.S. Government finances by February 2009; possibility of civil war within the U.S. resulting from the collapse; detainment of "insurgent U.S. citizens" in anticipation of their moving against the government;...

roleset.name: affect emotionally
roleset.note: MOVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'move' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus. (from move.05-v predicate notes)
MOVING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on move-v.05. Corresponds to VNcls amuse-31.1 (from moving.05-n)

example.name: move-v: transitive
example.text: John moved her heart with that old song.

example.name: move-v: passive with nonagentive cause
example.text: [Others]-1 are moved *-1 when they see young people willing * to give up their careers in order * to return to their hometown.
example.arg: when they see young people willing * to give up their careers in order * to return to their hometown.

example.name: moving-n: args 0, 1, EXT
example.text: The song's moving her to tears was a point of embarrassment.

roleset.name: proceed to a new place or subject matter

example.name: move_on-v
example.text: Here are 12 signs it's time *PRO* to move on from a relationship.

example.name: move_on-v
example.text: The goal is for him-1 *PRO*-1 to move on with his life and for us to move on as well .

roleset.name: aable to be repositioned
roleset.note: MOVEABLE-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to move.01 (from moveable.01-j)

example.name: moveable-j: args 0, 1, EXT
example.text: Eew palpating for shit masses . A classmate found one in me once and was like wtf is that thing that-1 *T*-1 's so moveable . Janice came over and identified it for us .

roleset.name: working toward a purpose, as a group
roleset.note: MOVEMENT-N NOTES: Created by Julia. No Vncls. No Fn class. Updated by Katie. (from movement.02-n)

role.descr: group of people starting a revolution

example.name: with goal of movement
example.text: diplomatic movement

example.name: movement-n: with LOC
example.text: a nationwide movement to stop these people

example.name: movement-n: goal of the movement
example.text: the liberation movement

example.name: movement-n: both args
example.text: Yasser Arafat's Fetah movement
